items.sentence: There's no point in dwelling on it any further.
Paris is one of the cities I visited last year.
Do you know the reason why Tom cut class today?
How did you find out that Tom couldn't do that?
I thought I heard Tom was the one who did that.
I wonder why Tom suggested I do that by myself.
Tom knew he wasn't going to be able to do that.
Tom realized he didn't have to do that anymore.
Tom and I followed Mary and John down the path.
We need to find a good place to pitch our tent.
